tooltip: Select Maiamai as your hero of choice.

heroSelectionDescriptionElements.tooltipText: Maiamai focuses on improving Octorok units.
Allows you to summon Maiamai, a ranged hero that summons Octoroks.
Octorok Battalion size increased by +2, Bigocto Battalion size increased by +1
Octorok and Octogon attack range increased by 25%
Octoroks gain an armored shell, improving their armor. Bigoctos, Octogons, and all Bigocto Buildings also gain an armor bonus.
